{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Arris |model=VAP4402 |fcc_date=06/17/2015 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=MitraStar |type=range extender |fcc_id=ZMYHGW-500BNA-QC |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Quantenna |cpu1_model=QT3860BC;Quantenna, Communications, QT3860BC, AA02F1D1, A02409, 1444; |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=ESMT |ram1_model=M15F1G1664A-ADB |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe (half), |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Quantenna |wi1_chip1_model=QT3860BC;Quantenna, Communications, QT3860BC, AA02F1D1, A02409, 1444; |wi1_chip2_brand=Quantenna |wi1_chip2_model=QT2518B;QT2518B, AA00G0D1, A02012, 1436; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=4 |wi2_module=MitraStar DTB-120GN-KE v1 |wi2_module_if=Mini PCIe (half) |wi2_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi2_chip1_model=RTL8192EE;RTL8192EE, E9E20H1 GE42; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_chip1_brand=Realtek |eth_chip1_model=RTL8211E;RTL8211E, E8M23P2, GE378; |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model=RTL8211E;RTL8211E, E8M23P2, GE378; |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=2 |flags=DFS (slave), TR-069, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=ARRISXXXX_2.4G, ARRISXXXX_5G }} :{{ProductPage|http://www.arris.com/products/vap4402-wireless-extender/}}
This device may have previously been known as the [[Pace AW525]] ([http://www.acsinc.tv/uploads/7/2/2/1/7221094/user-guide_aw525.pdf User Guide]) before [http://www.arris.com/company/pace/ Pace became part of Arris].
